```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(p8105.datasets)

data("rest_inspec")


# Cleaning the data before plotting (filtering and/or sampling)
rest_inspec_clean =
  rest_inspec %>%
  mutate(year = as.integer(format(grade_date, "%Y")),
         month = month(grade_date, label = TRUE),
         cuisine_description = str_replace(cuisine_description, "CafÃ©/Coffee/Tea", "Cafe")) %>% 
    select(grade, critical_flag, boro, cuisine_description, year, month, score) %>%
  drop_na(grade) 

view(rest_inspec_clean)
```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Line Plot

```{r}
line_plot <- rest_inspec_clean %>%
  filter(year >= 2013 & year <= 2017, !boro %in% c("Missing", "")) %>%
  group_by(boro, year) %>%
  summarize(mean_score = mean(score)) %>%
  plot_ly(
    x = ~year,
    y = ~mean_score,
    color = ~boro,
    type = "scatter",
    mode = "lines+markers"
  ) %>%
layout(
    title = "Average Resturant Inspection Score by Borough Across Years (2013-2017)",
    xaxis = list(
      title = "Year",
      tickmode = "array",
      tickvals = c(2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017),
      dtick = 1
    ),
    yaxis = list(title = "Average Inspection Score")
  )

line_plot
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Box Plot 

```{r}
rest_inspec_2017 <- rest_inspec_clean %>%
  filter(year == 2017, !boro %in% c("Missing", ""))

# Create the box plot using Plotly
plot_ly(data = rest_inspec_2017, 
        y = ~score,
        x = ~boro,
        color = ~boro,
        type = "box",
        colors = "viridis") %>% 
  layout(title = "Distribution of Restaurant Inspection Scores by Borough, 2017",
         xaxis = list(title = "Borough"),
         yaxis = list(title = "Restaurant Inspection Score"))

```

### Bar Chart

```{r}
# Filter the data for the year 2017
rest_inspec_2017 <- rest_inspec_clean %>%
  filter(year == 2017)

# Calculate the total number of violations by cuisine type for 2017
violations_by_cuisine_2017 <- rest_inspec_2017 %>%
  group_by(cuisine_description, critical_flag) %>%
  summarize(violation_count = n()) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = critical_flag, values_from = violation_count, values_fill = 0) %>%
  mutate(total_violations = `Critical` + `Not Critical`)

# Calculate the percentage of critical violations
percent_violation <- violations_by_cuisine_2017 %>%
  mutate(
    percentage_critical = (`Critical` / total_violations) * 100)
view(percent_violation)

# Create the bar chart using Plotly
bar_chart <- percent_violation %>%
  mutate(cuisine_description = fct_reorder(cuisine_description, percentage_critical)) %>%
  plot_ly(
    x = ~percentage_critical,
    y = ~cuisine_description,
    type = "bar",
    orientation = 'h'
  ) %>%
  layout(
    title = "Percentage of Critical Violations by Cuisine Type (2017)",
    xaxis = list(title = "Percentage of Critical Violations"),
    yaxis = list(title = "Cuisine Type")
  )

bar_chart
```
